# svelte-imask changelog

## 1.2.0
* small re-write
* 2way-binding support for `value` prop of MaskedInput component (see demo)

## 1.1.3
* sync input value with imask

## 1.1.2
* Bind unmaskedValue to MaskedInput prop `value`.

## 1.1.1
* Add demo to README

## 1.1.0

* Upgrade to latest version of Svelte

## 1.0.0

* First release
